00024  *    distribution.

00055 enum WordBreakClass
00056 {
00057     WBP_Undefined,
00058     WBP_CR,
00059     WBP_LF,
00060     WBP_Newline,
00061     WBP_Extend,
00062     WBP_Format,
00063     WBP_Katakana,
00064     WBP_ALetter,
00065     WBP_MidNumLet,
00066     WBP_MidLetter,
00067     WBP_MidNum,
00068     WBP_Numeric,
00069     WBP_ExtendNumLet,
00070     WBP_Regional,
00071     WBP_Any
00072 };
